translations: 一稿多投的，卖给多家播出单位的
使……在多家报刊上同时发表；把……组成辛迪加（syndicate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: His column is syndicated throughout the world.
sentences.translation: 他的专栏文章在世界各地的报刊发表。

sentences.sentence: Today his programme is syndicated to 500 stations.
sentences.translation: 今天他的节目被出售给500家电台播出。

sentences.sentence: Several firms of mechanical engineering have been syndicated.
sentences.translation: 几家机械工程公司已联合起来。
